contentfulBlogPost.title: Come visit our general meeting on September 15th!

childMarkdownRemark.html: The first general meeting at UTSC for Blankets for T.O. this academic year will take place September 15th, 2022 from 5pm-6pm in IC212.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The first general meeting at UTSC for Blankets for T.O. this academic year will take place September 15th, 2022 from 5pm-6pm in IC212.
